source_sentence: 金光明經卷第二
translation: Golden Light Sutra, Volume 2

source_sentence: 北涼三藏法師曇無讖譯
translation: Translated by Dharmakṣema, the Tripiṭaka Master of Northern Liang

source_sentence: 金光明經四天王品第六
translation: The Sixth Chapter of the Sutra of Golden Light on the Four Heavenly Kings

source_sentence: 爾時毘沙門天王、提頭賴吒天王、毘留勒叉天王、毘留博叉天王，俱從座起偏袒右肩，右膝著地胡跪合掌，白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Vaiśravaṇa, Dhṛtarāṣṭra, Virūḍhaka, and Virūpākṣa all rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, knelt on their right knees, put their palms together, and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典眾經之王，諸佛世尊之所護念，莊嚴菩薩深妙功德，常為諸天之所恭敬，能令天王心生歡喜，亦為護世之所讚歎。
translation: This is the king of sūtras, a subtle scripture of golden light that's guarded by the buddhas and honored by the world-honored ones, adorns the profound and marvelous virtues of the bodhisattvas, is always venerated by the gods, rejoices the hearts of god kings, and is praised by those who protect the world.

source_sentence: 此經能照諸天宮殿，是經能與眾生快樂，是經能令地獄、餓鬼、畜生諸河焦乾枯竭，是經能除一切怖畏，是經能却他方怨賊，是經能除穀貴饑饉，是經能愈一切疫病，是經能滅惡星變異，是經能除一切憂惱。
translation: This sūtra can illuminate the palaces of the gods, it can make sentient beings happy, it can cause the rivers of hell, hungry ghosts, and animals to dry up and wither, it can remove all fears, it can counteract enemies and thieves from other directions, it can remove grain and famine, it can heal all epidemics, it can extinguish the mutations of bad stars, and it can remove all sorrow.

source_sentence: 舉要言之，是經能滅一切眾生無量無邊百千苦惱。
translation: To sum up, this sūtra can end the measureless, limitless, and one hundred thousand sufferings and distress of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，若在大眾廣宣說時，我等四王及餘眷屬，聞此甘露無上法味，增益身力心進勇銳具諸威德。
translation: When this subtle sūtra of golden light is proclaimed in public, the four kings and the rest of our retinue hear the unsurpassed flavor of this immortal dharma, and it increases their physical strength, mental effort, and fortitude, endowed with authoritative qualities.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王，能說正法修行正法，為世法王以法治世。
translation: We four kings are capable of teaching the right Dharma and cultivating the right Dharma, so we're the Dharma kings of the world who govern the world.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及天、龍、鬼神、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽，以法治世，遮諸惡鬼噉精氣者。
translation: We four kings, gods, dragons, demons, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas govern the world and keep evil spirits from devouring our energy.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王二十八部諸鬼神等，及無量百千鬼神，以淨天眼過於人眼，常觀擁護此閻浮提。
translation: We four kings, twenty-eight groups of demons, and measureless hundreds of thousands of other demons always observe and protect Jambudvīpa with the pure divine eye, which is superior to the human eye.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是故我等名護世王。
translation: That's why we're called the guardian kings of the world.

source_sentence: 若此國土有諸衰耗、怨賊侵境、饑饉疾疫種種艱難，若有比丘受持是經，我等四王當共勸請，令是比丘以我力故，疾往彼所國邑郡縣，廣宣流布是金光明微妙經典，令如是等種種百千衰耗之事悉皆滅盡。
translation: If this land experiences various hardships like debilitation, enemies and thieves, and famine and epidemics, then if a monk accepts this sūtra, we four kings will jointly encourage him to quickly go to that country or town and spread this subtle sūtra of golden light because of our strength, so that all of these hundreds of thousands of debilitating conditions will cease.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如諸國王所有土境，是持經者若至其國，是王應當往是人所，聽受如是微妙經典，聞已歡喜，復當護念恭敬是人。
translation: If a sūtra holder arrives in a king's territory, that king should go to that person, listen to and accept such a subtle sūtra, rejoice after hearing it, and then guard, remember, and respect that person.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王，復當勤心擁護是王及國人民，為除衰患令得安隱。
translation: We four kings will again diligently support this king and his people, so that we can remove the troubles and make them comfortable.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷受持是經，若諸人王有能供給施其所安，我等四王，亦當令是王及國人民一切安隱具足無患。
translation: If monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen accept this sūtra, and if there are people whose king is able to make offerings and give them peace, we four kings will also cause that king and his people to be completely secure and without danger.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有四眾受持讀誦是妙經典，若諸人王有能供養恭敬尊重讚歎；我等四王，亦復當令如是人王，於諸王中常得第一供養恭敬尊重讚歎，亦令餘王欽尚羨慕稱讚其善。」
translation: If there are four multitudes who retain and recite these wonderful sūtras, and if there are human kings who can offer support, honor, respect, and praise them, we four kings will also cause such human kings to always be the first among kings to offer support, honor, respect, and praise them, and cause the other kings to admire and praise their goodness."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊讚歎護世四天王等：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān praised the four heavenly kings who protected the world, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王，過去已曾供養恭敬尊重讚歎無量百千萬億諸佛，於諸佛所種諸善根，說於正法修行正法，以法治世為人天王。
translation: You four kings, you've made offerings to, honored, respected, and praised measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of buddhas in the past, planted good roots in their places, taught the right Dharma and cultivated the right Dharma, and ruled the world as kings of humans and gods.

source_sentence: 汝等今日長夜利益於諸眾生，行大悲心，施與眾生一切樂具，能遮諸惡勤與諸善。
translation: Today, you spend a long night benefiting sentient beings, acting with great compassion, bestowing all the pleasant implements of sentient beings, and being able to shield them from evil and diligently cultivate goodness.

source_sentence: 以是義故，若有人王能供養恭敬此金光明微妙經典，汝等正應如是護念，滅其苦惱與其安樂。
translation: For this reason, if there are kings who offer support and respect this marvelous sūtra of golden light, you should precisely protect and remember it in this way, ending their suffering and distress and bringing them peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 「汝等四王及諸眷屬、無量無邊百千鬼神，若能護念如是經者，即是護持去來現在諸佛正法。
translation: "If you four kings and your retinues, measureless and limitless hundreds of thousands of ghosts and spirits can guard and remember such a sūtra, you're guarding the right Dharma of the past and future Buddhas in the present.

source_sentence: 汝等四王及餘天眾百千鬼神，與阿脩羅共戰鬪時，汝等諸天常得勝利。
translation: When you four kings and the rest of the gods and hundreds of thousands of demons fight together with Asura, you gods always get victory.

source_sentence: 汝等若能護念此經，悉能消伏一切諸苦，所謂怨賊饑饉疾疫。
translation: If you can protect and remember this sūtra, you'll be able to quell all suffering, such as resentments and thieves, famine, and epidemics.

source_sentence: 若四部眾有能受持讀誦此經，汝等亦應勤心守護，為除衰惱施與安樂。」
translation: If there are four groups of people who can memorize and recite this sūtra, you should also diligently guard it and give it to them for the purpose of removing their troubles and giving them peace and happiness."

source_sentence: 爾時四王復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four kings again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，於未來世在所流布，若國土城邑郡縣村落隨所至處，若諸國王以天律治世，復能恭敬至心聽受是妙經典，并復尊重供養供給持是經典四部之眾，以是因緣，我等時時得聞如是微妙經典，聞已即得增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
translation: "When this subtle sūtra of golden light is disseminated in the future, if cities, towns, counties, villages, and towns go where they please, and if the kings of countries ruled by the laws of gods and goddesses in the world can respectfully and wholeheartedly listen to and accept this wonderful sūtra and respectfully make offerings to the four groups of people who uphold it, then we'll be able to hear such a wonderful sūtra from time to time, and after hearing it, we'll attain physical strength and mental vigor and become endowed with authoritative qualities.

source_sentence: 是故我等及無量鬼神，常當隱形隨其妙典所流布處，而作擁護令無留難；亦當護念聽是經典諸國王等及其人民，除其患難悉令安隱，他方怨賊亦使退散。
translation: Therefore, we and measureless demons will always take cover and follow the dissemination of these wonderful sūtras, shielding them and making them not difficult to stay, and we'll also guard and remember the kings of countries and their people who hear this sūtra, saving them from trouble and making them all secure, and causing resisters and thieves from other directions to retreat.

source_sentence: 若有人王聽是經時，隣國怨敵興如是念：『當具四兵壞彼國土。』
translation: When a king hears this sūtra, the enemies of that neighboring country think, 'They will bring four armies to destroy their land.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是經典威神力故，爾時隣敵更有異怨為作留難，於其境界起諸衰惱災異疫病。
translation: Because of the authoritative power of this sūtra, then another enemy in the neighborhood makes trouble for them, causing misery, distress, disasters, and epidemics in their environment.

source_sentence: 爾時怨敵起如是等諸惡事已，備具四兵，發向是國規往討罰。
translation: After these kinds of bad deeds arise, the enemy then prepares four armies and sets out for that country to seek punishment.

source_sentence: 我等爾時，當與眷屬無量無邊百千鬼神，隱蔽其形為作護助，令彼怨敵自然退散，起諸怖懅種種留難。
translation: At that point, we'll bring along our retinue of measureless, limitless hundreds of thousands of demons who will conceal their forms and serve as guardians, causing that enemy to naturally retreat and cause various difficulties that are frightening.

source_sentence: 彼國兵眾尚不能到，況復當能有所破壞？」
translation: How could that country's armies fail to reach them, so how could they do anything to harm them?"

source_sentence: 爾時佛讚四天王等：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the Buddha praised the four heavenly kings and others, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王，乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王受持是經恭敬供養者，為消衰患令其安樂；復能擁護宮殿舍宅城邑村落國土邊疆，乃至怨賊悉令退散，滅其衰惱令得安隱，亦令一切閻浮提內所有諸王無諸凶衰鬪訟之事。
translation: 汝等四王，乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王受持是經恭敬供養者，為消衰患令其安樂；復能擁護宮殿舍宅城邑村落國土邊疆，乃至怨賊悉令退散，滅其衰惱令得安隱，亦令一切閻浮提內所有諸王無諸凶衰鬪訟之事。

source_sentence: 「四王當知，此閻浮提八萬四千城邑聚落、八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國娛樂快樂，各各於國而得自在；於自所有錢財珍寶，各各自足不相侵奪；如其宿世所修集業隨業受報，不生惡心貪求他國；各各自生利益之心，生於慈心、安樂之心、不諍訟心、不破壞心、無繫縛心、無楚撻心，各於其土自生愛樂，上下和睦猶如水乳，心相愛念增諸善根。
translation: "You should know, four kings, that 84,000 cities and villages in Jambudvīpa and 84,000 human kings each enjoy the pleasures of their own country, each attains freedom in their country, each has enough money and treasure of their own, each doesn't plunder each other, each receives the results of their actions as they've cultivated actions in previous lives, each doesn't give rise to bad thoughts and cravings for other countries, each produces a mind for benefit, a mind of kindness and happiness, a mind that's not contentious, a mind that's not destructive, a mind that's not fettered, and a mind that's not harsh, each produces their own happiness in their land, their up and down are in harmony like water and milk, and their mind's loving regard for each other increases their good roots.

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，此閻浮提安隱豐樂，人民熾盛大地沃壤，陰陽調和時不越序，日月星宿不失常度，風雨隨時無諸災橫，人民豐實自足於財，心無貪吝亦無嫉妬，等行十善，其人壽終多生天上，天宮充滿增益天眾。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, this Jambudvīpa is peaceful and abundant, its people are raging and the earth is fertile, the yin and yang are in harmony at regular intervals and don't overstep their order, the sun, moon, and stars don't lose their regularity, the wind and rain come at regular intervals and aren't disastrous, the people are prosperous and self-sufficient in possessions, their hearts aren't stingy or jealous, and they equally practice the ten good qualities, so many of their lives will end up in the heavens, and the palaces of the gods will be filled with a multitude of gods.

source_sentence: 「若未來世有諸人王聽是經典，及供養恭敬受持是經四部之眾，是王則為安樂利益汝等四王及餘眷屬無量百千諸鬼神等。
translation: "If there are human kings in future generations who listen to this sūtra and make offerings to the four groups of people who respect and uphold it, that king will benefit you four kings and the rest of your retinue, including measureless hundreds of thousands of spirits and other spirits, for their well-being.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 汝等四王，若得時時聞是經典，則為已得正法之水，服甘露味增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
translation: "You four kings, if you could hear this sūtra from time to time, you would have attained the water of the right teaching, increased your physical strength by taking the taste of ambrosia, and gained the authority and strength of mind to advance.

source_sentence: 是諸人王，若能至心聽受是經，則為已能供養於我。
translation: If these human kings wholeheartedly listen to and accept this sūtra, then they've been able to make offerings to me.

source_sentence: 若供養我，則是供養過去未來現在諸佛；若能供養過去未來現在諸佛，則得無量不可思議功德之聚。
translation: If they make offerings to me, they're making offerings to the buddhas of the past, future, and present, and if they can make offerings to the buddhas of the past, future, and present, they'll attain an unfathomable stock of merit.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，是諸人王應得擁護，及后妃婇女中宮眷屬諸王子等亦應得護，衰惱消滅快樂熾盛，宮殿堂宇安隱清淨無諸災變，護宅之神增長威德，亦受無量歡悅快樂。
translation: Because of this, these human kings should be protected, and so should their wives, ladies, maids, central palace retinues, princes, and others, whose troubles and discomforts subside and whose happiness flourishes, whose palaces and halls are peaceful and pure, free of calamity, and whose house guardian gods grow in authority and receive measureless joy and happiness.

source_sentence: 是諸國土所有人民，悉受種種五欲之樂，一切惡事悉皆消滅。」
translation: All the people of those lands will experience the various five pleasures, and all bad deeds will cease."

source_sentence: 爾時四天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four heavenly kings said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未來之世若有人王，欲得護身及后妃婇女諸王子等宮殿屋宅，得第一護身所王領最為殊勝，具不可思議王者功德；欲得攝取無量福聚，國土無有他方怨賊，無諸憂惱及諸苦事。
translation: "In a future age, if there's a king who wants to protect his body and the palaces and mansions of his wives, concubines, princes, and others, and attain the most distinguished king's position as the first to protect his body, with unfathomable royal virtues, he'll be able to gather an immeasurable amount of merit, have his land free of enemies and thieves from other places, and be free of sorrow and suffering.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是人王，不應放逸散亂其心，應生恭敬謙下之心，應當莊嚴第一微妙最勝宮宅，種種香汁持用灑地，散種種華，敷大法座師子之座，兼以無量珍琦異物而為校飾，張施種種無數微妙幢幡寶蓋；當淨洗浴以香塗身，著好淨衣纓絡自嚴，坐卑小座不自高大，除去自在離諸放逸，謙下自卑除去驕慢，正念聽受如是妙典，於說法者生世尊想；復於宮內后妃王子婇女眷屬，生慈哀心和顏與語，勸以種種供養之具供養法師。
translation: Thus, the king should not be careless and dissipate his mind but should instead cultivate a respectful and humble attitude; he should adorn the most subtle and excellent palace, sprinkle the ground with various perfumes and juices, scatter various flowers, dress the great Dharma throne as a lion's seat, decorate it with measureless rare and exotic things, and spread out countless subtle banners, streamers, and jeweled canopies; he should bathe himself with incense, wear fine and pure clothing, adorn himself, sit on a lowly seat that's not self-elevating, remove his ease and dissipation, humble himself, remove his pride, correctly listen and accept such wonderful scriptures, and give rise to the idea of the Bhagavān in the Dharma preacher; furthermore, the queen, princess, and ladies of the palace should be kind and compassionate, and they should speak with a pleasant countenance and encourage the making of various offerings to the Dharma teacher.

source_sentence: 是王爾時既勸化已，即生無量歡喜快樂，心懷悅豫倍復自勵，不生疲倦多作利益，於說法者倍生恭敬。」
translation: After he encouraged and educated them, the king became immeasurably joyous and happy, rejoiced in his mind and encouraged himself, didn't become weary and did much to benefit them, and paid extra respect to the Dharma preacher."

source_sentence: 爾時佛告四天大王：「爾時人王，應著白淨鮮潔之衣，種種纓絡齊整莊嚴，執持素白微妙上蓋，服飾容儀不失常則，躬出奉迎說法之人。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the four celestial kings, "At that point, the human king should wear white, clean, and fresh clothing, be fully adorned with various kinds of armor, carry a plain, white, and subtle canopy, and dress in a manner that doesn't lose its normal norms as he goes out to greet the preacher.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 是王如是隨其舉足步步之中，即是供養值遇百千億那由他諸佛世尊；復得超越如是等劫生死之難；復於來世爾所劫中，常得封受轉輪王位；隨其步步亦得如是現世功德不可思議自在之力；常得最勝極妙七寶人天宮殿；在在生處增益壽命；言語辯了人所信用；無所畏忌有大名稱；常為人天之所恭敬，天上人中受上妙樂；得大勢力具足威德；身色微妙端嚴第一；常值諸佛遇善知識；成就具足無量福聚。
translation: 是王如是隨其舉足步步之中，即是供養值遇百千億那由他諸佛世尊；復得超越如是等劫生死之難；復於來世爾所劫中，常得封受轉輪王位；隨其步步亦得如是現世功德不可思議自在之力；常得最勝極妙七寶人天宮殿；在在生處增益壽命；言語辯了人所信用；無所畏忌有大名稱；常為人天之所恭敬，天上人中受上妙樂；得大勢力具足威德；身色微妙端嚴第一；常值諸佛遇善知識；成就具足無量福聚。

source_sentence: 「汝等四天王！
translation: "You four celestial kings!

source_sentence: 如是人王，見如是等種種無量功德利益，是故此王應當躬出奉迎法師；若一由旬至百千由旬，於說法師應生佛想，應作是念：『今日釋迦如來正智，入於我宮受我供養，為我說法，我聞是法，即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已為得值百千萬億那由他佛，已為供養過去未來現在諸佛，已得畢竟三惡道苦。
translation: Thus, when a human king sees these kinds of immeasurable merits and benefits, the king should go out to greet the Dharma teacher; if it takes from one to a hundred thousand leagues, the Dharma teacher should give rise to the idea of a buddha and think, 'Today, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata of correct wisdom has entered my palace, accepted my offerings, and taught me the Dharma; when I hear this teaching, I won't turn back from the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment; I've attained the worthiness of a hundred thousand million Nayutpala buddhas; I've made offerings to the buddhas of the past, future, and present; and I've ended the suffering of the three bad destinies.

source_sentence: 我今已種百千無量轉輪聖王釋梵之因，已種無邊善根種子，已令無量百千萬億諸眾生等度於生死，已集無量無邊福聚，後宮眷屬已得擁護，宮宅諸衰悉已消滅，國土無有怨賊棘刺，他方怨敵不能侵陵。』
translation: Now, I've planted a hundred thousand incalculable causes of the turning of the wheel of the noble king Śākyamuni, planted limitless seeds of good roots, caused measureless hundreds of thousands of trillions of sentient beings to pass through birth and death, accumulated measureless and limitless merits, secured the protection of my retinue and retinue, extinguished all the decay in my palace, and left my land free of thorns and thieves, so enemies from other lands can't invade it.'

source_sentence: 「汝等四王！
translation: "You four kings!

source_sentence: 如是人王，應作如是供養正法，清淨聽受是妙經典，及恭敬供養尊重讚歎持是經典四部之眾；亦當迴此所得最勝功德之分，施與汝等及餘眷屬諸天鬼神。
translation: Thus, King of men, you should make such offerings to the right teaching, listen purely to and accept this wonderful sūtra, and respectfully offer support to the four groups of people who honor and praise the upholding of this sūtra; you should also return the portion of the most excellent merit gained here to you and the rest of your retinue, gods, spirits, and other members of your retinue.

source_sentence: 聚集如是諸善功德，現世常得無量無邊不可思議自在之利，威德勢力成就具足，能以正法摧伏諸惡。」
translation: Gathering such good qualities, you'll always attain unfathomable, limitless, and unfathomable benefits in the present life, and you'll be complete in terms of authority and power, capable of overcoming evil with the right teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時四王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four kings said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若未來世有諸人王，作如是等恭敬正法，至心聽受是妙經典，及恭敬供養尊重讚歎持是經典四部之眾，嚴治舍宅香汁灑地，專心正念聽說法時，我等四王亦當在中共聽此法，願諸人王為自利故，以己所得功德少分施與我等。
translation: If there will be human kings in the future who do this kind of reverence for the right teaching, wholeheartedly listen to and accept this wonderful sūtra, and respectfully offer support, honor, and praise the four groups of people who hold this sūtra, decorate their homes with incense and juice, and concentrate their minds on the teaching, then we four kings will be among them, listening to this teaching together, and may those human kings give a small portion of the merit they've gained to us for our own benefit.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸人王於說法者所坐之處，為我等故燒種種香供養是經，是妙香氣，於一念頃即至我等諸天宮殿，其香即時變成香蓋，其香微妙金色晃耀照我等宮釋宮梵宮。
translation: At the place where the Dharma preacher was sitting, these human kings burned various kinds of incense to offer this sūtra on our behalf, and this wonderful fragrance reached our heavenly palaces in an instant of thought, and that fragrance immediately became a fragrant lid that shone with a subtle golden color in our palaces, the palace of Śākyamuni, and the palace of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 大辯天神、功德天神、堅牢地神、散脂鬼神、最大將軍、二十八部鬼神大將、摩醯首羅、金剛密迹、摩尼跋陀鬼神大將、鬼子母，與五百兒子周匝圍繞，阿耨達龍王、娑竭羅龍王，如是等眾，自於宮殿各各得聞是妙香氣，及見香蓋光明普照，是香蓋光明亦照一切諸天宮殿。」
translation: The god of eloquence, the god of merit, the god of the firmament, the demon of loose fat, the greatest general, the general of the twenty-eight demons, Mahêśvara, the vajra miracle, the general of the demon of Māṇibhadra, the mother of demons, and their five hundred sons surrounded them, the dragon king of Anavatapta, the dragon king of Sāgara, and so forth each could hear this wonderful fragrance in their palaces and see the lid of the fragrance shining brightly everywhere, and the lid of the fragrance shone brightly in all the palaces of the gods."

source_sentence: 佛告四王：「是香蓋光明非但至汝四王宮殿。
translation: The Buddha told the four kings, "This fragrant luminosity doesn't just reach the palaces of your four kings.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 是諸人王手擎香爐，供養經時，其香遍布，於一念頃遍至三千大千世界，百億日月、百億大海、百億須彌山、百億大鐵圍山小鐵圍山及諸山王；百億四天下、百億四天王、百億三十三天，乃至百億非想非非想天。
translation: As these human kings held the censer in their hands and made offerings to the sūtras, their fragrance spread throughout the 3,000,000 worlds in an instant of thought, reaching 10 billion suns and moons, 10 billion oceans, 10 billion Sumeru mountains, 10 billion large and small iron mountains and mountain kings, 10 billion of the four continents, 10 billion of the four heavenly kings, 10 billion Trāyastriṃśa gods, and even 10 billion of the non-perception and non-conception gods.

source_sentence: 於此三千大千世界、百億三十三天，一切龍、鬼、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽，宮殿虛空悉滿種種香煙雲蓋，其蓋金光亦照宮殿。
translation: In these 3,000,000 worlds and 10 billion Trāyastriṃśa heavens, the palaces and sky of all the dragons, ghosts, gods, ascetics, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas are filled with various smoky cloud canopies, and their canopies shine with a golden light that radiates from the palaces.

source_sentence: 如是三千大千世界，所有種種香煙雲蓋，皆是此經威神力故。
translation: Such a variety of smoky cloud canopies in a world of 3,000 great one-thousand worlds is all due to the authoritative power of this sūtra.

source_sentence: 「是諸人王手擎香爐供養經時、種種香氣，不但遍此三千大千世界，於一念頃亦遍十方無量無邊恒河沙等百千萬億諸佛世界，於諸佛上虛空之中，亦成香蓋，金光普照，亦復如是。
translation: "When these human kings carry the censer in their hands to make offerings to the sūtra, the various fragrances not only permeate this 3,000,000 worlds, but also, in an instant of thought, permeate the infinite and limitless Ganges River Sands and hundreds of thousands of millions of Buddha-realms in the ten directions, and form a fragrant canopy in the sky above the buddhas that shines with a golden light that also does the same.

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊聞是妙香，見是香蓋及金色光，於十方界恒河沙等諸佛世界，作如是等神力變化已，異口同音於說法者稱讚：『善哉，善哉！
translation: After the world-honored buddhas heard this wonderful fragrance and saw this fragrant lid and golden light create such miraculous changes in the worlds of the Ganges River Sands and other buddhas in the ten directions, they spoke with one voice and praised the Dharma preacher, 'Good, good!

source_sentence: 大士！
translation: Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 汝能廣宣流布如是甚深微妙經典，則為成就無量無邊不可思議功德之聚，若有聞是甚深經典，所得功德則為不少，況持讀誦為他眾生開示分別演說其義。
translation: If you can widely proclaim and disseminate such a profound and subtle sūtra, you'll achieve a measureless and limitless stock of unfathomable merit, and if someone hears this profound sūtra, they'll attain no small amount of merit, much less retain it, read it, recite it, and explain its meaning for the discernment of other sentient beings.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此金光明微妙經典，無量無邊億那由他諸菩薩等，若得聞者，即不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。』
translation: If this subtle scripture of golden light were heard by measureless and limitless billions of nayutas and other bodhisattvas, they would not retrogress from unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 「爾時十方無量無邊恒河沙等，諸佛世界現在諸佛，異口同聲作如是言：『善男子！
translation: "At the time, the measureless, infinite number of buddhas of the Ganges River Sands in the ten directions and the many buddha-worlds present spoke with one voice, saying, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝於來世必定當得坐於道場菩提樹下，於三界中最尊最勝，出過一切眾生之上，勤修力故受諸苦行，善能莊嚴菩提道場，能壞三千大千世界外道邪論，摧伏諸魔怨賊異形，覺了諸法第一寂滅清淨無垢甚深無上菩提之道。
translation: In a future life, you will surely be able to sit under the bodhi tree on the site of enlightenment, most honored and most distinguished among the three realms, surpassing all sentient beings, diligently cultivating the strength to undergo various ascetic practices, skillfully adorning the site of enlightenment, capable of destroying the mistaken theories of non-Buddhists in a world of 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, subduing Māra, the enemy, and aliens, and realizing the unsurpassed bodhi path that's the most tranquil, pure, undefiled, and profound in terms of understanding all dharmas.

source_sentence: 「『善男子！
translation: "'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝已能坐金剛座處，轉於無上諸佛所讚十二種行甚深法輪，能擊無上最大法鼓，能吹無上極妙法螺，能竪無上最勝法幢，能然無上極明法炬，能雨無上甘露法雨，能斷無量煩惱怨結，能令無量百千萬億那由他眾，度於無涯可畏大海，解脫生死無際輪轉，值遇無量百千萬億那由他佛。』」
translation: You have been able to sit at the adamantine seat, turn the Dharma wheel of unsurpassed twelve practices praised by the buddhas as being quite profound, beat the unsurpassed greatest Dharma drum, blow the unsurpassed most wonderful Dharma conch, raise the unsurpassed most excellent Dharma banner, produce the unsurpassed most brilliant Dharma torch, rain the unsurpassed sweet dew Dharma rain, cut the bonds of affliction and enmity, cause measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of nayutas to cross the endless and fearless ocean, liberate from the endless cycle of birth and death, and meet measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of nayutas.'"

source_sentence: 爾時四天王復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four heavenly kings again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，能得未來現在種種無量功德，是故人王，若得聞是微妙經典，則為已於百千萬億無量佛所種諸善根。
translation: "This subtle scripture of golden light can obtain measureless merits in the future and present, so if a human king hears this subtle scripture, then he will have planted good roots in one hundred thousand million million incalculable buddha-places.

source_sentence: 我以敬念是人王故，復見無量福德利故，我等四王及餘眷屬無量百千萬億鬼神，於自宮殿見是種種香煙雲蓋瑞應之時，我當隱蔽不現其身，為聽法故，當至是王所至宮殿講法之處。
translation: Because I respectfully remember this human king and see measureless merits and benefits, when the four kings and the rest of my retinue, a hundred thousand million million ghosts and spirits, see these various auspicious responses of smoke, clouds, and hoods in their palaces, I will hide myself from them and go to the palace where the king goes to discuss the teaching for the sake of listening to the teaching.

source_sentence: 大梵天王、釋提桓因、大辯天神、功德天神、堅牢地神、散脂鬼神、大將軍等，二十八部鬼神大將、摩醯首羅、金剛密迹、摩尼跋陀鬼神大將、鬼子母及五百兒子，周匝圍繞，阿耨達龍王、娑竭羅龍王，無量百千萬億那由他鬼神諸天，如是等眾為聽法故，悉自隱蔽不現其身，至是人王所止宮殿講法之處。
translation: The king of Brahmā, Śakra Devānām-Indra, the god of eloquence, the god of merit, the god of the firmament, the demon of loose fat, the great general, the 28 generals of demons, Mahêśvara, Vajra Maitreya, the general of the demon of Manibhadra, the mother of demons, and 500 sons, all surrounded by them, the dragon king of Anavatapta and the dragon king of Sāgara, and measureless hundreds of thousands of trillions of nayutas of demons and gods, all of these people concealed themselves and didn't show themselves as they listened to the teaching, so they went to the palace where the king was staying to deliver the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及餘眷屬無量鬼神，悉當同心以是人王為善知識，同共一行善相應行，能為無上大法施主，以甘露味充足我等；我等應當擁護是王，除其衰患令得安隱，及其宮宅國土城邑，諸惡災患悉令消滅。
translation: We four kings and the rest of our retinue, a myriad of spirits, should all join together and consider this human king to be a good teacher who shares the same good deeds, is a great donor of unsurpassed qualities, and fills us with the taste of ambrosia; we should protect this king, remove his troubles and make him comfortable, and extinguish all bad fortune in his palace, land, and city.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有人王，於此經典心生捨離不樂聽聞，其心不欲恭敬供養尊重讚歎；若四部眾有受持讀誦講說之者，亦復不能恭敬供養尊重讚歎。
translation: "If there are any kings who are discarding this sūtra in their minds and aren't happy to hear it, and their minds don't want to respect, offer support, honor, and praise it, then even if there are four groups of people who accept, read, recite, and preach it, they won't be able to respect, offer support, honor, and praise it.

source_sentence: 我等四王及餘眷屬無量鬼神，即便不得聞此正法，背甘露味失大法利，無有勢力及以威德，減損天眾增長惡趣。
translation: Even if we four kings and the rest of our retinue, with our countless ghosts and spirits, couldn't hear this right teaching, we'd lose the great benefit of the Dharma because we didn't taste the ambrosia, and we'd lack power and authority, which would diminish the host of gods and lead them to a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神捨其國土，不但我等，亦有無量守護國土諸舊善神皆悉捨去。
translation: "When the four of us kings and measureless demons abandon their lands, not only we but also measureless old good spirits guarding the land will all abandon them.

source_sentence: 我等諸王及諸鬼神既捨離已，其國當有種種災異，一切人民失其善心，唯有繫縛瞋恚鬪諍，互相破壞多諸疾疫，彗星現怪流星崩落，五星諸宿違失常度，兩日並現日月薄蝕，白黑惡虹數數出現，大地震動發大音聲，暴風惡雨無日不有，穀米勇貴饑饉凍餓，多有他方怨賊侵掠其國，人民多受苦惱，其地無有可愛樂處。
translation: After we kings and demons abandon them, various calamities will occur in that country, and all the people will lose their good intentions and become nothing but fetters, anger, and fights, destroying each other and causing many epidemics, strange meteors appearing as comets and falling meteors, the five constellations going out of whack, the sun and moon appearing together, white and black bad rainbows appearing repeatedly, a great earthquake producing a loud noise, violent winds and bad rains occurring day after day, grain and rice becoming expensive, famine and starvation, many enemies and thieves from other lands invading that country, and the people being subject to suffering and distress, there's no place in that land that's desirable or pleasant.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及諸無量百千鬼神，并守國土諸舊善神，遠離去時生如是等無量惡事。
translation: We four kings and measureless hundreds of thousands of ghosts and spirits, as well as the old good spirits guarding the land, left to do measureless bad things like this.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有人王，欲得自護及王國土多受安樂，欲令國土一切眾生悉皆成就具足快樂，欲得摧伏一切外敵，欲得擁護一切國土，欲以正法正治國土，欲得除滅眾生怖畏。
translation: "Suppose there's a king who wants to be able to protect himself and enjoy much comfort in his kingdom, want to make all the sentient beings in his kingdom perfectly happy, want to subdue all external enemies, want to uphold all his kingdoms, want to correctly govern his kingdom with the right teaching, and want to remove the fears of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是人王等，應當必定聽是經典，及恭敬供養讀誦受持是經典者。
translation: "Such people, kings, should surely listen to this sūtra and respectfully make offerings to those who read, recite, and uphold it.

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神，以是法食善根因緣，得服甘露無上法味，增長身力心進勇銳增益諸天。
translation: Because of the good roots and causes of this Dharma food, we four kings and measureless demons can take the unsurpassed Dharma taste of ambrosia and increase their physical strength, mental effort, and boldness, which will enrich the gods.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 以是人王至心聽受是經典故，如諸梵天說出欲論、釋提桓因種種善論、五通之人神仙之論。
translation: Because the human king wholeheartedly listened to this scriptural text, he did as the brahma gods did when they taught the Treatise on Setting Out Desires, the Śakra Devānām-Indra Treatise on Various Good Practices, and the Treatise on the Five Supernormal Powers of Human and Spiritual Beings.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 梵天釋提桓因五神通人，雖有百千億那由他無量勝論，是金光明於中最勝。
translation: "Although the five supernormal powers of Brahmā Śakrodevānām Indra have measureless victories over hundreds of billions of nayutas, this is the greatest of them all, that is, golden light.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 如來說是《金光明經》，為眾生故，為令一切閻浮提內諸人王等以正法治，為與一切眾生安樂，為欲愛護一切眾生，欲令眾生無諸苦惱，無有他方怨賊棘刺，所有諸惡背而不向，欲令國土無有憂惱，以正法教無有諍訟，是故人王各於國土，應然法炬熾然正法增益天眾。
translation: "Thus, when the Tathāgata teaches this Sutra of Golden Light, for the sake of sentient beings and in order to cause all the human kings in Jambudvīpa to rule correctly, for the welfare of all sentient beings, in order to love and protect all sentient beings, in order to cause sentient beings to be free of suffering and distress, to be free of the thorns of enemies and thieves from other directions, to turn away from all evil, to make their lands free of sorrow, and to teach the right Dharma so that there are no disputes, each human king responds with a torch of the Dharma that blazes the right Dharma and enriches the gods.

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神、閻浮提內諸天善神，以是因緣，得服甘露法味充足，得大威德進力具足，閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛安樂其處；復於來世無量百千不可思議那由他劫，常受微妙第一快樂，復得值遇無量諸佛種諸善根，然後證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, we four kings, measureless demons, and the good spirits of the gods in Jambudvīpa have been able to enjoy the full flavor of ambrosia, attain great authority and power, become comfortable and abundant in Jambudvīpa, and have a population that flourishes and lives in comfort; furthermore, in measureless hundreds of thousands of unfathomable nayutas in the future, we'll always experience the subtle first happiness and meet measureless buddhas who plant good roots and then realize supreme, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 得如是等無量功德，悉是如來正遍知說，如來過於百千億那由他諸梵天等，以大悲力故，亦過無量百千億那由他釋提桓因，以苦行力故。
translation: Attaining such measureless merits is all because the Tathāgata knows perfectly well that the Tathāgata exceeds ten hundred billion nayutas of brahma gods and so forth by the power of great compassion and an infinite number of ten hundred billion nayutas of Śakra Devānām-Indra by the power of ascetic practices.

source_sentence: 是故如來為諸眾生，演說如是《金光明經》。
translation: Therefore, the Tathāgata explains the Golden Light Sutra like this for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若閻浮提一切眾生及諸人王，世間出世間所作國事，所造世論皆因此經。
translation: This sūtra is the reason why all sentient beings and human kings in Jambudvīpa create national affairs and worldly discussions that transcend the secular and transmundane.

source_sentence: 欲令眾生得安樂故，釋迦如來示現是經廣宣流布。
translation: Because he wants to cause sentient beings to attain well-being, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata presents this sūtra and disseminates it widely.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，是諸人王，應當必定聽受供養恭敬尊重讚歎是經。」
translation: Because of these reasons, these human kings should definitely listen, accept offerings, respect, honor, and praise this sūtra."

source_sentence: 爾時佛復告四天王：「汝等四王及餘眷屬無量百千那由他鬼神！
translation: It was then that the Buddha again addressed the four heavenly kings, "You four kings and the rest of your retinues, countless hundreds of thousands of nayuta spirits!

source_sentence: 是諸人王，若能至心聽是經典，供養恭敬尊重讚歎。
translation: "If these human kings wholeheartedly listen to this sūtra and offer support, respect, honor, and praise it, you four kings should properly embrace it, ending their troubles and bringing peace.

source_sentence: 汝等四王，正應擁護，滅其衰患而與安樂。
translation: You four kings should properly support it, extinguishing its troubles and bringing peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 若有人能廣宣流布如是妙典，於人天中大作佛事，能大利益無量眾生，如是之人，汝等四王，必當擁護莫令他緣而得擾亂，令心恬靜受於快樂，續復當得廣宣是經。」
translation: If there's someone who can widely proclaim and disseminate such a wonderful sūtra, who greatly undertakes Buddha-works among humans and gods, and who can greatly benefit measureless sentient beings, you four kings will guard such a person so that he doesn't allow other conditions to disturb him and so that his mind is calm and he enjoys happiness, and then he'll be able to widely proclaim this sūtra."

source_sentence: 爾時四天王，即從座起偏袒右肩，右膝著地長跪合掌，於世尊前以偈讚曰：「佛月清淨，　　滿足莊嚴，　　佛日暉曜，　放千光明。
translation: It was then that the four heavenly kings rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, knelt on their right knees, and joined their palms as they saluted the Bhagavān with this verse, "The Buddha's moon is pure and perfectly adorned, and the Buddha's sun shines and radiates a thousand rays of light.

source_sentence: 如來面目，　　最上明淨，　齒白無垢，　　如蓮華根；　　功德無量，　猶如大海；　　智淵無邊，　　法水具足；　百千三昧，　　無有缺減；　　足下平滿，　千輻相現；　　足指網縵，　　猶如鵝王；　光明晃耀，　　如寶山王；　　微妙清淨，　如鍊真金；　　所有福德，　　不可思議；　佛功德山，　　我今敬禮。
translation: The Tathāgata's face is supremely clear and pure, his teeth are white and spotless like the lotus root, his virtues are immeasurable like the ocean, his wisdom is limitless, and his Dharma waters are plentiful, his one hundred thousand samādhis are without loss, his feet are flat and full, and his thousand-spoked body appears, his toes are webbed like a king goose, his brightness shines like a jeweled mountain king, he's exquisitely pure like polished real gold, his merits are unfathomable, and I now venerate him as the Buddha's mountain of merit.

source_sentence: 佛真法身，　猶如虛空，　　應物現形，　　如水中月，　無有障礙，　　如焰如化，　　是故我今，　稽首佛月。」
translation: The true Dharma body of the Buddha is like space, manifests itself in response to things, is like the moon in water, has no obstructions, and is like flames and transformation; therefore, I now bow my head to the Buddha's moon."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，以偈答曰：「此金光明，　　諸經之王，　　甚深最勝，　為無有上；　　十力世尊，　　之所宣說，　汝等四王，　　應當勤護。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān answered in a verse, "This golden radiance, the king of sūtras, is so profound and most excellent that it has no equal; it's taught by the Bhagavān of the Ten Powers, and you four kings should guard it diligently.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，　是深妙典，　　能與眾生，　　無量快樂，　為諸眾生，　　安樂利益，　　故久流布，　於閻浮提；　　能滅三千，　　大千世界，　所有惡趣，　　無量諸苦。
translation: Because of this cause and condition, this profound and wonderful sūtra can give measureless happiness to sentient beings and bring comfort and benefit to all sentient beings, so it's spread long and wide in Jambudvīpa and can extinguish 3,000 great thousand worlds, all bad destinies, and measureless suffering.

source_sentence: 閻浮提內，　諸人王等，　　心生慈愍，　　正法治世，　若能流布，　　此妙經典，　　則令其土，　安隱豐熟，　　所有眾生，　　悉受快樂。
translation: Within Jambudvīpa, all the kings of men have compassion on their hearts, and if they correctly govern the world and can disseminate this wonderful sūtra, it will make their lands peaceful and abundant, and all sentient beings will experience happiness.

source_sentence: 若有人王，　　欲愛己身，　　及其國土，　欲令豐盛，　　應當至心，　　淨潔洗浴，　往法會所，　　聽受是經。
translation: If there are kings who want to love themselves and their lands and want them to be abundant, they should wholeheartedly cleanse and bathe themselves, go to the Dharma assembly, and listen to and accept this sūtra.

source_sentence: 是經能作，　所有善事，　　摧伏一切，　　內外怨賊；　復能除滅，　　無量怖畏；　　是諸經王，　能與一切，　　無量眾生，　　安隱快樂。
translation: These sūtras are capable of performing all kinds of good deeds, subduing all internal and external enemies and thieves, and removing measureless fears; these are the sūtra kings who can give peace and happiness to all measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 譬如寶樹，　　在人家中，　　悉能出生，　一切珍寶；　　是妙經典，　　亦復如是，　悉能出生，　　諸王功德。
translation: Like a jeweled tree that produces all the treasures in a person's home, so too do these wonderful sūtras produce the king's merits.

source_sentence: 如清冷水，　能除渴乏；　　是妙經典，　　亦復如是，　能除諸王，　　功德渴乏。
translation: Like clear, cold water that quells thirst, so too does this wonderful sūtra quell the thirst of kings for their virtues.

source_sentence: 譬如珍寶、　異物篋器，　　悉在于手，　　隨意所用；　是金光明，　　亦復如是，　　隨意能與，　諸王法寶。
translation: Like a treasure or a container for another thing that's in your hand and can be used as you like, so too is this gold light that can be given to kings as you like, a treasure of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 是金光明，　　微妙經典，　常為諸天，　　恭敬供養；　　亦為護世，　四大天王，　　威神勢力，　　之所護持；　十方諸佛，　　常念是經，　　若有演說，　稱讚善哉。
translation: This golden light, a marvelous scripture, is always offered with respect and veneration by the gods; it also protects the world and is guarded by the might and power of the four great heavenly kings; the buddhas in the ten directions are always mindful of this sūtra, and if they ever expound it, they praise it as good.

source_sentence: 亦有百千，　　無量鬼神，　從十方來，　　擁護是人；　　若有得聞，　是妙經典，　　心生歡喜，　　踊躍無量。
translation: There are also hundreds of thousands of measureless ghosts and spirits that come from ten directions to protect this person; if anyone hears this wonderful sūtra, their hearts rejoice and they dance incalculably.

source_sentence: 閻浮提內，　　無量大眾，　　皆悉歡喜，　集聽是經；　　聽是經故，　　具諸威德，　增益天眾，　　精氣身力。」
translation: Measureless multitudes in Jambudvīpa are delighted and assemble to hear this sūtra; as a result of listening to this sūtra, they'll attain authoritative qualities that will enhance the energy and physical strength of the gods."

source_sentence: 爾時四天王聞是偈已，白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After the four heavenly kings heard this verse, they said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我從昔來未曾得聞如是微妙寂滅之法，我聞是已心生悲喜涕淚交流，舉身戰動肢節怡解，復得無量不可思議具足妙樂。」
translation: Never since the distant past have I been able to hear such a subtle and tranquil teaching, and after hearing it, my heart was overcome with sorrow and joy, my body shook with joy and my limbs were relieved, and I again attained unfathomable, complete, and marvelous happiness."

source_sentence: 以天曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華，供養奉散於如來上。
translation: I offered offerings of celestial flowers and mahāmandāra flowers to the Tathāgata and scattered them there.

source_sentence: 作如是等供養佛已，復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After making these offerings to the Buddha, he then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王，各各自有五百鬼神，常當隨逐是說法者而為守護。」
translation: Each of the four of us kings has 500 demons who will always follow this Dharma speaker and guard him."

source_sentence: 金光明經大辯天神品第七
translation: Jin guangming jing dabbian celestial spirits pin 7

source_sentence: 爾時大辯天白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Mahābherī gods said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是說法者，我當益其樂說辯才，令其所說莊嚴次第善得大智，若是經中有失文字句義違錯，我能令是說法比丘次第還得，能與總持令不忘失。
translation: "Suppose this Dharma preacher gives them the eloquence to readily expound the Dharma, causes them to adorn what they preach in order, and well acquires great wisdom; if there's a mistake in the words or phrases or a mistake in the meaning of this sūtra, I can cause this preaching monk to retrieve it in order, and I can give it a general maintenance so that it won't be forgotten.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典令不斷絕，復令無量無邊眾生得聞是經，當令是等悉得猛利不可思議大智慧聚、不可稱量福德之報，善解無量種種方便、善能辯暢一切諸論、善知世間種種技術，能出生死得不退轉，必定疾得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: If there are sentient beings who have planted good roots in a hundred thousand buddha-places, for the sake of such people, this Dharma preacher will widely proclaim and disseminate this wonderful sūtra in Yambudvīpa so that it won't be cut off, and cause measureless and limitless sentient beings to hear it, so that they will all attain a fierce, unfathomably large aggregate of wisdom, the rewards of immeasurable merit, a good understanding of measureless methods, a good ability to eloquently comprehend all the treatises, and a good knowledge of the various techniques of the world, be able to escape birth and death and attain irreversibility, and surely attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment quickly."

source_sentence: 金光明經功德天品第八
translation: Jin guangming jing gongde tian pin eighth

source_sentence: 爾時功德天白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Mahākauṣṭhila gods said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是說法者，我當隨其所須之物，衣服飲食臥具醫藥及餘資產，供給是人無所乏少，令心安住晝夜歡樂，正念思惟是經章句分別深義。
translation: "This Dharma preacher will provide whatever things he needs, including clothing, food, drink, bedding, medicine, and other necessities, to this person without wanting anything, make his mind comfortable and happy day and night, and correctly contemplate the profound meaning of this sūtra's phrases and discernments.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典令不斷絕，是諸眾生聽是經已，於未來世無量百千那由他劫，常在天上人中受樂，值遇諸佛，速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉畢無餘。
translation: If there are sentient beings who have planted good roots in one hundred thousand buddha-places, and this Dharma preacher, for such reasons, widely proclaims and disseminates this wonderful sūtra in Yambudvīpa so that it doesn't stop, then after listening to this sūtra, those sentient beings will, in an infinite number of hundreds of thousands of nayutas in the future, always enjoy happiness among gods and humans, meet buddhas, quickly achieve supreme perfect enlightenment, and completely end the suffering of the three evil destinies without remainder.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我已於過去寶華功德海琉璃金山照明如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊所種諸善根，是故我今隨所念方、隨所視方、隨所至方，能令無量百千眾生受諸快樂，若衣服飲食資生之具、金銀七寶、真珠琉璃、珊瑚琥珀、壁玉珂貝，悉無所乏。
translation: I have planted good roots in the past that were planted by the Tathāgata, the Worthy of Offerings, the Perfectly Omniscient, the Perfection of Knowledge, the Well Gone, the Worldly Understander, the Unsurpassed One, the Trainer, the Teacher of Gods and People, the Buddha, and the Bhagavān, so now, wherever I think, wherever I look, and wherever I go, I can cause measureless hundreds of thousands of sentient beings to experience various pleasures, such as clothing, food, necessities, gold, silver, seven treasures, genuine pearls and lapis lazuli, coral, amber, and wall jade and scallops, of which there's nothing to lack.

source_sentence: 若有人能稱金光明微妙經典，為我供養諸佛世尊，三稱我名燒香供養；供養佛已，別以香華種種美味，供施於我灑散諸方，當知是人即能聚集資財寶物。
translation: If someone can praise the subtle sūtras of golden light, make offerings to the world honored buddhas for me, burn incense and make offerings by calling my name three times, and then make offerings of flowers and various delicacies to me after making those offerings to the buddhas and scattering them in different directions, you should know that person will be able to gather wealth, possessions, and treasures.

source_sentence: 以是因緣增長地味，地神諸天悉皆歡喜，所種穀米牙莖枝葉果實滋茂，樹神歡喜出生無量種種諸物。
translation: Because of this cause and condition, the taste of the earth grows, the gods of the earth and gods rejoice, the grains and rice they grow, the stems, branches, leaves, and fruits flourish, and the gods of the trees rejoice and produce measureless things.

source_sentence: 我時慈念諸眾生故，多與資生所須之物。
translation: Because I was compassionate toward sentient beings, I often gave them the things they needed to support life.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 於此北方，毘沙門天王有城名曰阿尼曼陀，其城有園名功德華光，於是園中有最勝園，名曰金幢七寶極妙，此即是我常止住處。
translation: To the north of here, the Vaiśravaṇa god king has a city named Animānta, and within that city there's a park called Glorious Flower Light, and within that park there's the most excellent park, which is called the Golden Banner and Seven Treasures of the Most Excellent, and this is where I always stay.

source_sentence: 若有欲得財寶增長，是人當於自所住處，應淨掃灑洗浴其身，著鮮白衣妙香塗身，為我至心三稱彼佛寶華琉璃世尊名號，禮拜供養燒香散華；亦當三稱金光明經至誠發願，別以香華種種美味，供施於我散灑諸方，爾時當說如是章句：「波利富樓那遮利　三曼陀達舍尼羅佉　摩訶毘呵羅伽帝　三曼陀毘陀那伽帝　摩訶迦梨波帝　波婆禰　薩婆哆[口*后]　三曼陀　脩鉢梨富隷　阿夜那達摩帝　摩訶毘鼓畢帝　摩訶彌勒簸僧祇帝　醯帝簁三博祇悕帝　三曼陀阿咃　阿[少/兔]婆羅尼「是灌頂章句，必定吉祥真實不虛。
translation: If there's someone who wants to grow in wealth and treasure, they should wash themselves clean, put on fresh white clothing and marvelous incense, wholeheartedly praise the name of that precious, flowery, lapis lazuli Buddha three times, venerate and make offerings to him, burn incense and scatter flowers, and sincerely vow to praise the golden light sūtra three times and make offerings of flowers and various delicacies to me to scatter in different directions.

source_sentence: 等行眾生及中善根，應當受持讀誦通利，七日七夜受持八戒，朝暮淨心，香華供養十方諸佛，常為己身及諸眾生，迴向具足阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，作是誓願：『令我所求皆得吉祥。』
translation: Equally practicing sentient beings and those with middling good roots should memorize, recite, and read them thoroughly, observe the eight precepts for seven days and nights, purify their minds as they go about their day, offer flowers and make offerings to the buddhas in the ten directions, and always dedicate themselves and all sentient beings to the perfection of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, making this vow: 'That everything I seek will be auspicious.'

source_sentence: 自於所居房舍屋宅淨潔掃除。
translation: He cleans and sweeps away the house and dwelling where he lives.

source_sentence: 若自住處、若阿蘭若處，以香泥塗地、燒微妙香、敷淨好座，以種種華香布散其地以待於我；我於爾時如一念頃，入其室宅即坐其座，從此日夜令此所居，若村邑、若僧坊、若露地，無所乏少，若錢若金銀若珍寶、若牛羊若穀米，一切所須即得具足悉受快樂。
translation: If I were to smear the ground with scented mud, burn a subtle incense, spread a clean and nice seat, and scatter various kinds of flowers and fragrances on the ground in anticipation of me, I would enter my dwelling and sit on its seat just as soon as I thought about it, and from then on, day and night, I would cause this dwelling, whether it's a village, a monastery, or an open field, to have nothing lacking, and to have everything it needs, whether it's money, gold, silver, treasure, cattle, sheep, or grain, to be fully satisfied and happy.

source_sentence: 若能以己所作善根最勝之分迴與我者，我當終身不遠其人，於所住處至心護念，隨其所求令得成就。
translation: If someone can give me back the most excellent part of the good roots of what they've done, I will never separate from them for the rest of my life, guard and remember them with all my heart where I live, and follow their desires to their fulfillment.

source_sentence: 「應當至心禮如是等諸佛世尊，其名曰：寶勝如來、無垢熾寶光明王相如來、金焰光明如來、金百光明照藏如來、金山寶蓋如來、金華焰光相如來、大炬如來、寶相如來；亦應敬禮：信相菩薩、金光明菩薩、金藏菩薩、常悲菩薩、法上菩薩；亦應敬禮：東方阿閦如來、南方寶相如來、西方無量壽佛、北方微妙聲佛。」
translation: "You should wholeheartedly venerate these world-honored buddhas whose names are: the Tathāgata of Jeweled Victory, the Tathāgata of the King of Stainless Tejaprabhā, the Tathāgata of Golden Flame Light, the Tathāgata of Golden Hundred Lights Illuminating the Treasury, the Tathāgata of Golden Mountain Jewels, the Tathāgata of Golden Flower Flames and Light, the Tathāgata of the Great Torch, and the Tathāgata of Jeweled Appearance.

source_sentence: 金光明經堅牢地神品第九
translation: Jin guangming jing 坚牢地神品第九

source_sentence: 爾時地神堅牢白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the earth spirit Kālôdayin said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，若現在世若未來世，在在處處——若城邑聚落，若山澤空處，若王宮宅。
translation: "This is a subtle scripture of golden light that exists in the present and future worlds and everywhere - in cities and towns, in empty places in mountains and swamps, and in the king's palace.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 隨是經典所流布處，是地分中敷師子座，令說法者坐其座上，廣演宣說是妙經典；我當在中常作宿衛，隱蔽其身於法座下頂戴其足。
translation: "According to this sūtra's dissemination site, I'll spread out a lion's seat in this part of the earth, cause the Dharma preacher to sit on it, and explain this wonderful sūtra in detail; I'll always be a constant guard in there, covering myself and putting my feet up under the Dharma throne.

source_sentence: 我聞法已，得服甘露無上法味增益身力，而此大地深十六萬八千由旬，從金剛際至海地上，悉得眾味增長具足，豐壤肥濃過於今日。
translation: After hearing the Dharma, I'll be able to take the unsurpassed flavor of the Dharma as nectar and increase my physical strength, and the earth will be 168,000 leagues deep, from the tip of the vajra to the top of the sea, and it will be replete with many flavors and have a rich soil that's greater than today.

source_sentence: 以是之故，閻浮提內藥草樹木、根莖枝葉華果滋茂，美色香味皆悉具足。
translation: As a result, the medicinal plants and trees of Jambudvīpa, their roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruits flourish, and they are all replete with beautiful color and fragrance.

source_sentence: 眾生食已，增長壽命色力辯安，六情諸根具足通利，威德顏貌端嚴殊特；成就如是種種等已，所作事業多得成辦，有大勢力精勤勇猛。
translation: After eating them, sentient beings increase their life expectancy, become eloquent in form and strength, fully possess the faculties of the six senses, and have dignified and distinguished appearance; after accomplishing such things, their undertakings are often accomplished, and they have great power, diligence, and boldness.

source_sentence: 「是故，世尊！
translation: "Therefore, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 閻浮提內安隱豐樂人民熾盛，一切眾生多受快樂，應心適意隨其所樂。
translation: "In Jambudvīpa, security and prosperity abound, and the people flourish, and all sentient beings experience much happiness that accords with their minds and hearts and follows their inclinations.

source_sentence: 是諸眾生得是威德大勢力已，能供養是《金光明經》，及恭敬供養持是經者四部之眾。
translation: After attaining this authoritative power and great strength, these sentient beings are able to make offerings to this Sutra of Golden Light and respectfully make offerings to the four groups of people who hold this sūtra.

source_sentence: 我於爾時當往其所，為諸眾生受快樂故，請說法者廣令宣布如是妙典。
translation: At that point, I'll go there and ask the Dharma preacher to widely proclaim this wonderful sūtra for the sake of the happiness of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明若廣說時，我及眷屬所得功德倍過於常，增長身力心進勇銳。
translation: When this golden light is explained in detail, it will give me and my retinue more merit than usual and increase our physical strength and mental vigor.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我服甘露無上味已，閻浮提地縱廣七千由旬豐壤倍常。
translation: After I took the unsurpassed taste of this nectar, the land of Jambudvīpa, which is 7,000 leagues wide, became twice as rich and permanent.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是大地眾生所依，悉能增長一切所須之物，增長一切所須物已，令諸眾生隨意所用受於快樂——種種飲食衣服臥具、宮殿屋宅樹木林苑、河池井泉，如是等物依因於地悉皆具足。
translation: Thus, the earth is a support for sentient beings, which is able to grow all the things they need and, after growing all the things they need, cause sentient beings to use them as they like and experience the pleasure of various foods, clothing, bedding, palaces, houses, trees, groves, rivers, pools, wells, and springs, and so forth, all of which depend on the earth for their fulfillment.

source_sentence: 是故，世尊！
translation: Therefore, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸眾生為知我恩，應作是念：『我當必定聽受是經，供養恭敬尊重讚歎。』
translation: Knowing my kindness, all sentient beings should think, 'I will surely listen to and accept this sūtra, offering it with respect and honor and praise.'

source_sentence: 作是念已，即從住處，若城邑聚落舍宅空地，往法會所聽受是經。
translation: After they think this, they then go from their residence, whether it's a town, a village, a dwelling, or an empty lot, to the Dharma assembly to hear and accept this sūtra.

source_sentence: 既聽受已還其所止，各應相慶作如是言：『我等今者聞此甚深無上妙法，已為攝取不可思議功德之聚，值遇無量無邊諸佛，三惡道報已得解脫，於未來世常生天上人中受樂。』
translation: After listening and accepting it, they returned to their lodging and rejoiced with each other, saying, 'Now, we've heard this profound and unsurpassed wonderful teaching, which has gathered an unfathomable accumulation of merit, met with measureless and limitless buddhas, been freed from the consequences of the three bad destinies, and will always be born among gods and humans in the future to enjoy happiness.'

source_sentence: 是諸眾生各於住處，若為他人演說是經，若說一喻一品一緣，若復稱歎一佛一菩薩一四句偈乃至一句，及稱是經首題名字。
translation: Suppose these sentient beings each stay at a place where they explain this sūtra for others, or suppose they explain a parable, a class, or a condition, or suppose they praise a Buddha or a bodhisattva in a four-line verse or even a sentence, or suppose they call this sūtra by its title.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 隨是眾生所住之處，其地具足豐壤肥濃過於餘地，凡是因地所生之物，悉得增長滋茂廣大，令諸眾生受於快樂，多饒財寶好行惠施，心常堅固深信三寶。」
translation: Wherever sentient beings live, their soil is rich and fertile beyond that of other places, and whatever grows from the ground will grow and flourish, causing sentient beings to experience joy, abundantly produce wealth and treasure, do good gifts, and always have a strong mental conviction about the Three Treasures."

source_sentence: 爾時佛告地神堅牢：「若有眾生，乃至聞是《金光明經》一句之義，人中命終隨意往生三十三天。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the earth spirit Kaji, "If sentient beings even hear the meaning of this one sentence of the Sutra of Golden Light, they'll be reborn in the Trāyastriṃśa Heaven at will when their lives end.

source_sentence: 地神！
translation: Earth spirit!

source_sentence: 若有眾生，為欲供養是經典故莊嚴屋宅，乃至張懸一幡一蓋及以一衣，欲界六天已有自然七寶宮殿，是人命終即往生彼。
translation: If there are sentient beings who want to make offerings to this sūtra, adorn their homes or even hang a banner and a canopy with a single piece of clothing, or have a natural palace of seven treasures in the six heavens of the desire realm, then they'll be reborn there when their life ends.

source_sentence: 地神！
translation: Earth deity!

source_sentence: 於諸七寶宮殿之中，各各自然有七天女共相娛樂，日夜常受不可思議微妙快樂。」
translation: In each of the seven-jeweled palaces, there are naturally seven celestial women who entertain each other and enjoy unfathomably subtle pleasures day and night."

source_sentence: 爾時地神白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the earth spirit said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是因緣，說法比丘坐法座時，我常晝夜衛護不離，隱蔽其形在法座下頂戴其足。
translation: For this reason, when the teaching monk sits on the Dharma throne, I always guard him day and night and don't part from him, covering my form and wearing his feet under the Dharma throne.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典令不斷絕。
translation: "If there are sentient beings who have planted good roots in the presence of a hundred thousand buddhas, this Dharma preacher will widely proclaim and disseminate this wonderful sūtra in Yambudvīpa so that it doesn't stop.

source_sentence: 是諸眾生聽是經已，未來之世無量百千那由他劫，於天上人中常受快樂，值遇諸佛，疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉斷無餘。」
translation: After listening to this sūtra, those sentient beings will experience an infinite number of hundreds of thousands of nayutas in the future, always be happy among gods and humans, meet buddhas, quickly achieve unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, and completely end the suffering of the three evil destinies without remainder."

source_sentence: 金光明經卷第二
translation: Golden Light Sutra, Volume 2
